com.twitter.heron.integration_test.common.bolt

Class LocalWriteBolt

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.twitter.heron.api.topology.BaseComponent
      • com.twitter.heron.api.bolt.BaseBasicBolt
        • com.twitter.heron.integration_test.common.bolt.LocalWriteBolt
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBasicBolt, IComponent, java.io.Serializable

    public class LocalWriteBolt
extends BaseBasicBolt
    Given a local file path, this bolt will emit every line of received in String format, as well as write every line to the local file.

    Note: The number of parallelisms for this spout should be equal to the number of files/paths to read.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • execute

        public void execute(Tuple input,
                    BasicOutputCollector collector)
        Description copied from interface: IBasicBolt
        Process the input tuple and optionally emit new tuples based on the input tuple.

        All acking is managed for you. Throw a FailedException if you want to fail the tuple.

        Description copied from interface: IComponent
        Declare the output schema for all the streams of this topology.
        Parameters:
        declarer - this is used to declare output stream ids, output fields, and whether or not each output stream is a direct stream
